content.raw:
A quick update: since the end of the last year, we are able to compile both gzserver and gzclient.

gzserver seems to be working fine. We can interact with it using the gz tool or even connecting a gzclient from a linux box.

gzclient is still broken. The QT window appears but the rendering at this point is broken. I'm working on debugging it.

If anyone is interested in giving it a look, you can use our [INSTALL file](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/win_gerkey/INSTALL_WIN32.md?at=win_gerkey) as a starting point.
content.html:
A quick update: since the end of the last year, we are able to compile both gzserver and gzclient.

gzserver seems to be working fine. We can interact with it using the gz tool or even connecting a gzclient from a linux box.

gzclient is still broken. The QT window appears but the rendering at this point is broken. I'm working on debugging it.

If anyone is interested in giving it a look, you can use our INSTALL file as a starting point.
